songs.title: California King Bed (Bassjackers Radio)
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
In this California king bed
We're ten thousand miles apart
I've been California wishing on these stars
For your heart, for me
My California king
My California king
My California king
My California king
My California king

[Drop: Bassjackers]

[Chorus]
My California king
My California king
My California king
My California king
My California king

[Drop: Bassjackers]

[Outro]
My California king
My California king
My California king
